page.title: 12Commuting
page.content: Commuting to London is very convenient to the population of Sevenoaks because it is only 21 miles away and on the fast train it is only {32 minutes to Charing Cross station.} The first train to London departs Sevenoaks at 5.11am. The reason Sevenoaks is so popular for commuting is because it is fairly rural but near the capital. The tickets cost 5.40 return for an adult. We found 33% of children in our school had parents who worked in London. The national average price of houses is 36,000pounds and the average price of a house in Sevenoaks is about 70,000 pounds. Houses in Sevenoaks are dearer because it is one of the best places for commuting to London. House prices in Sevenoaks have gone up 10% in the last year, 100% in five years and 300% in eight years.
